t: Amazon Announces New, State-of-the-Art Fulfillment Center to be Built in Mississippi | Business Wire
s: November 12, 2020 - This fulfillment center will be the first facility located in the Magnolia State to feature Amazon’s innovative robotics technology. The company launched its first facility in Mississippi in Byhalia in 2019, and a new fulfilment center this August in Olive Branch.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
